SIDE BAR MODE

Welcome to my Big-Ol' testing site!

This is a short site at the moment as I'm still learning the basics of web developement. You can see the different applications available to use by navigating the top navbar. So far the applications I have are:

  • Eve Online Price Puller
There will be plenty more applications coming. Eventually this site will be converted into an actual website to host useful applications to EVE players. At the same time I plan to learn and improve my skills along the way! Sounds like a win-win scenario!
Yes, there is a lot of unnecessary text throughout the homepage. The intent is to create enough information to fill the containers and make this look like a legit front-page :) After some time there will be more useful information here, but until then, enjoy the view!
